Dr. Kyle Taylor

Dr. Kyle Taylor is a board certified pediatric dentist originally from Edinburgh, Indiana. He graduated from the University of Indianapolis in 1995 with a B.S. in Chemistry. He continued his studies at Indiana University School of Dentistry and graduated in 1999 with a Doctor of Dental Surgery. Dr. Taylor then received his Pediatric Dentistry Certificate from Indiana University located at Riley Hospital for Children in 2001. Upon completion of his academic training he opened Bloomington Pediatric Dentistry in the fall of 2001. Dr. Taylor is a member of several organized dentistry associations, a part- time faculty member in the undergraduate pediatric dental clinic of Indiana University Dental School, and holds privileges at Indiana University Health Bloomington Hospital. Dr. Taylor enjoys coaching kids sports, playing golf, and searching for Americaâ€™s best doughnut!
